New Records: Mohammad Rizwan became the fastest player to score 3,000 T20I runs
Pakistan won the match by seven wickets
Key Match Events: Pakistan's bowling attack dominated New Zealand, taking quick wickets and restricting them to 90 runs
Shaheen Afridi, Mohammad Amir, Abrar Ahmed, and Shadab Khan each took multiple wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Rizwan and Irfan Khan Niazi steered the home side to victory
Others: The match was the second T20I in the series
The Green Shirts now lead the series 1-0
